law.history: Repealed 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 69, effective December 1, 1972. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 134, sec. 45, effective June 19, 1952.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Purgation by board of registration commissioners in cities of first class on grounds of death, disqualification, marriage or failure to vote.
